Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT mail_id FROM [w2_MailTemplate] WHERE shop_id = '0' AND mail_id = N'10000101') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_MailTemplate] ( [shop_id] ,[mail_id] ,[mail_name] ,[mail_from] ,[mail_to] ,[mail_cc] ,[mail_bcc] ,[mail_subject] ,[mail_body] ,[mail_subject_mobile] ,[mail_body_mobile] ,[mail_attachmentfile_path] ,[del_flg], [date_created] ,[date_changed] ,[last_changed] ,[mail_from_name] ,[mail_category] ,[auto_send_flg] ,[language_code] ,[language_locale_id] ,[sms_use_flg] ,[line_use_flg] ) VALUES ( N'0' ,'10000101' ,'電子発票発行失敗【管理者向け】' ,'bh@w2s.xyz' ,'bh@w2s.xyz' ,'' ,'' ,'電子発票発行失敗【管理者向け】' ,'@@ message @@' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'0' ,CAST('2020-12-15T17:42:40.243' AS DateTime) ,CAST('2020-12-15T17:42:40.243' AS DateTime) ,'ｗ２ユーザー' ,'' ,'Custom' ,'1' ,'' ,'' ,'0' ,'0') END
